title: Machine Learning, Statistics, NLP
subtitle: Self-Learning with Various Courses & Books
summary:
Reading:
* [An Introduction to Statistical Learning](http://faculty.marshall.usc.edu/gareth-james/ISL/)
* [Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow, 2nd Edition](https://www.oreilly.com/library/view/hands-on-machine-learning/9781492032632/)
* [Programming PyTorch for Deep Learning](http://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920216032.do)
* [Deep Learning](https://www.deeplearningbook.org/)

 Course: [CS224n: Natural Language Processing with Deep Learning](https://web.stanford.edu/class/archive/cs/cs224n/cs224n.1194/)

title: Computer Vision with Machine Learning
subtitle: Self-Learning with PyTorch
summary: Working towards research in Computer Vision. Using PyTorch for advanced feature extraction with a modified pretrained [ResNet](https://arxiv.org/abs/1512.03385), [scikit-learn](https://scikit-learn.org/) for clustering, [DeepSpeech](https://github.com/mozilla/DeepSpeech) for ASR, and [BART](https://github.com/pytorch/fairseq/blob/master/examples/bart/README.md) for summarization.

title: Fast.ai
subtitle: Deep Learning Fundamentals
summary: Completed parts one and two. Developed an understanding for advanced deep learning concepts by building several near state-of-the-art models and writing some ML functions from scratch. Built [AI Respiratory Doctor](https://haydenhousen.com/projects/ai-respiratory-doctor/).

title: Johns Hopkins Center for Talented Youth (CTY)
summary: Completed “Introduction to Java” and “Advanced Java” courses. I also took AP Computer Science A through CTY.

title: FreeCodeCamp
subtitle: Awarded Front End Development Certificate
summary: Completed about 400 hours of coursework. Built 10 front-end projects. Completed 347 coding challenges.

title: Various Online Computer Courses
subtitle: Lynda.com/Udacity/CodeCademy
summary:
Lynda.com: 19 courses completed including the “Programming Foundations” series by Simon Allardice

Udacity: Completed several courses about JavaScript, Android, Web Design, and Networking

CodeCademy: Completed various tutorials involving basic web development
